text: wmkr aladhin kafaruu min bani 'iisrayiyl bieisaa ealayh alslam, bi'ana wkkalu bih min yqtlh ghilt, falqa allah shabah eisaa ealaa rajul dllahm ealayh famsku bh, waqataluh wslbwh znaan minhum 'anah eisaa ealayh alslam, wallah khayr almakryn. wafi hdha 'iithbat sifat almakr lilah -teala- ealaa ma ylyq bjlalh wkmalh; li'anah makar bhq, wafi muqabalat makar almakryn
